title: Swap Facilitator/Practitioner headshot to new uploaded static asset

requirements.summary: Replace the PractitionerAuthority (Facilitator/Practitioner) headshot image with the newly uploaded photo served as a frontend static asset.
acceptanceCriteria: The PractitionerAuthority (Facilitator/Practitioner) headshot no longer references the old image path and instead references the new uploaded photo as a static asset (e.g., under frontend/public/assets/...).
The new image is included in the repository under frontend/public so it is served directly by the frontend build (no backend fetching).
The headshot renders correctly in the PractitionerAuthority section in both mobile and desktop layouts without stretching (maintains a square crop/aspect).

file_operations.description: Add the cropped/resized, web-optimized JPG derived from “WhatsApp Image 2026-02-05 at 9.44.49 AM.jpeg” as a centered square headshot (400x400) so it can be served directly as a static frontend asset.

Update the PractitionerAuthority headshot to reference the new static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/facilitator-headshot.user-upload.dim_400x400.jpg (replacing the previous /assets/generated/practitioner-headshot.user-upload.dim_400x400.jpg). Keep/verify square aspect and object-cover styling to prevent stretching on mobile/desktop.
